solution_line_template: If {num_sales_professionals} sales professionals each sell {cars_per_salesperson_per_month} cars per month, then they sell a combined {num_sales_professionals}*{cars_per_salesperson_per_month}=<<{num_sales_professionals}*{cars_per_salesperson_per_month}={combined_cars_per_month}>>{combined_cars_per_month} cars per month.

If the store has {total_cars_for_sale} cars, then it will take the sales team {total_cars_for_sale}/{combined_cars_per_month}=<<{total_cars_for_sale}/{combined_cars_per_month}={months_to_sell_all_cars}>>{months_to_sell_all_cars} months to sell all of the cars.
